name: 4:3 VidLii Flash Player
description:
Makes the Flash player on VidLii 4:3 (640 x 516).
(Optimized for 90% page zoom and YT 2007 player. Slightly broken on Channel 2.0)
additional_info:
Firefox users: Install PourBico
Chrome users: Install Resource Overrider
Optional pop-out player extension(s): https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/popvideo/ https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/popup-flash-video/hiiiompmigddkinbjjnacfjeodhipcah

Replace 'https://cdn.vidlii.com/player/as.swf' with 'https://cdn.vidlii.com/player/2006v6.swf' (remove quotes)

Full screen aspect ratio on a 16:9 display can be fixed by temporarily setting your screen resolution to 1280 x960 stretched. Preview: https://i.imgur.com/pidBrQs.jpg
